snippet: The I.R.S. plans to press political action committees like American Crossroads and Priorities USA to justify their tax-protected status as “social welfare” organizations.
abstract: Internal Revenue Service plans to press political action committees like American Crossroads and Priorities USA to justify their tax-protected status as 'social welfare' organizations; 16 Tea Party groups applying for nonprofit tax status are claiming harassment by the IRS and the number is growing.
lead_paragraph: The I.R.S. plans to press political action committees like American Crossroads and Priorities USA to justify their tax-protected status as “social welfare” organizations.

headline.seo: I.R.S. Scrutiny of Political Groups Stirs Harassment Claim
headline.main: Scrutiny of Political Nonprofits Sets Off Claim of Harassment
headline.print_headline: Scrutiny of Political Nonprofits Sets Off Claim of Harassment
